sentences.en: A spell of poor health took the edge off her performance.
sentences.cn: 一度身体欠佳令她表现有失水准。

sentences.en: At the highest executive levels earnings and performance aren't always correlated.
sentences.cn: 在最高管理层，收入与工作表现并不总是相关的。

sentences.en: Exam results are used as performance indicators (= things that show how well something is done ) for schools.
sentences.cn: 学校将考试成绩当成衡量学生表现的指标。

sentences.en: Experts agreed that this was a truly sensational performance.
sentences.cn: 专家们一致认为这的确是一场精彩绝伦的演出。

sentences.en: For details of the nearest performance look in the local listings magazines.
sentences.cn: 欲知离自己最近的演出的详情，请查询当地文娱预告杂志。

sentences.en: He is still smarting over criticism of his victorious but clumsy performance.
sentences.cn: 他还在为别人批评他尽管最终胜出但表现笨拙感到闷闷不乐。

sentences.en: He wanted to satisfy himself that he had given his best performance.
sentences.cn: 他想说服自己他已经发挥到极致了。

sentences.en: her disappointing performance in the Olympics
sentences.cn: 她在奥运会上的糟糕表现

sentences.en: I was impressed by the team’s performance.
sentences.cn: 该队的表现让我印象深刻。

sentences.en: Inside the theatre, they were giving a performance of Bizet's Carmen.
sentences.cn: 在剧院里，他们正在演出比才的作品《卡门》。

sentences.en: Most mothers are insecure about their performance as mothers.
sentences.cn: 大多数母亲对自己为人母的表现都不是很自信。

sentences.en: Sean’s performance at school has greatly improved.
sentences.cn: 肖恩在学校的表现进步很大。

sentences.en: Shareholders blamed him for the company’s poor performance .
sentences.cn: 股民认为他应对公司业绩不佳负责。

sentences.en: She made a big performance of sprinkling all the spices on.
sentences.cn: 她费了不少劲才把所有的香料都撒在上面。

sentences.en: She was crucified by the critics for her performance.
sentences.cn: 她的表演受到评论家的尖锐批评。

sentences.en: The camera combines rugged reliability with unequalled optical performance and speed.
sentences.cn: 这款相机既坚固耐用，又有超凡的光学性能和快门速度。

sentences.en: The country’s economic performance so far this year has been good.
sentences.cn: 到目前为止，该国今年的经济状况很好。

sentences.en: The orchestra gave its first performance on Whit Monday.
sentences.cn: 乐团在周一的圣灵降临节举行了首场演出。

sentences.en: the performance of his official duties
sentences.cn: 履行他的职务

sentences.en: The US dollar continued its strong performance in Tokyo today.
sentences.cn: 美元今天在东京继续保持强劲的走势。

sentences.en: There is an element of exhibitionism in the parents' performance too.
sentences.cn: 那对父母的表现也显得有些爱出风头。

sentences.en: These difficulties have been overcome without detriment to performance.
sentences.cn: 这些困难都已在不影响业绩的情况下得到了克服。

sentences.en: This evening’s performance will begin at 8.00 pm.
sentences.cn: 今晚的演出8点开始。

words.tran_cn: 作品,表演;戏剧;音乐会;芭蕾舞;独唱会
成功;功绩;工作;性能;行为,行动

phrases.tran_cn: 经营成绩，企业绩效；经营绩效
高效液相色谱法；高效液相层析

trans.tran_cn: 表演，表现，业绩，性能，执行，做，麻烦事
trans.tran_en: when someone performs a play or a piece of music
